channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Navy SEAL Tim Sheehy ousts 3-term Sen. Jon Tester in Montana Senate race

item.title: GOP Rep. Marcus Molinaro loses reelection to Democrat Josh Riley
item.description: Rep. Marcus Molinaro of New York, a Republican in a swing congressional district, lost his reelection late Tuesday night to Democrat Josh Riley.

item.title: Hamas reacts to Trump victory, says he must 'work seriously to stop the war' in Gaza
item.description: The Palestinian terrorist group Hamas says Donald Trump and his new administration must "work seriously" to stop the war in the Gaza Strip.

item.title: Trump’s victory speech hails ‘new star’ Elon Musk after tech titan’s billions help him win U.S. election
item.description: The Tesla CEO is a rising force in the Republican Party after playing a pivotal role in helping Donald Trump cruise to victory in Tuesday's election.

item.title: Donald Trump Declares Victory: ‘God Spared My Life For A Reason’

item.title: Trump Turns Wisconsin Red Again
item.description: Trump’s victory in swing state Wisconsin followed on the heels of his win in another critical so-called 'blue wall' state, Pennsylvania.

item.title: ‘Ann Selzer’s Wrong!’: Pollster Who Saw Harris Winning Red Iowa Misses Bigly
